title: Sarahs influence in Bringing Bendrixs awareness about the meaning of love in Graham Greenes the End of the Affair
abstract: The Topic of this thesis tells us about the influence of Sarah Miles to bring her lover, Bendrix Maurice, into his awareness about love. For Bendrix, what he means about love is hatred. His love to Sarah is seen from his easy jealousy toward that person and his inferiority character. But one point which can attract us is about what Sarah's done toward Bendrix into his awareness about the meaning of love through Sarah's sacrifice, her struggle in her vow which is seen from her diary. The topic of this thesis is elaborated by analyzing Sarah influence in Bendrix's awareness and her influence leads to the changing of Bendrix gradually. Actually Bendrix wants to be an eternal lover of Sarah without knowing Sarah opinions and Sarah purpose in loving him. Bendrix does not care about Sarah's feeling, as a matter of fact, his jealousy covered his mind. On the other hand, Sarah with her big sacrifice give herself to save Bendrix's live from death. The end of this thesis is clear that finally Sarah slowly brings Bendrix into awareness of love.
contributors: SARDIUS KUNTJARA (Advisor 1); Josefa Juniarti Mardijono (Examination Committee 1)
